casebody.data:
ELWELL
v.
STATE of NC. No. 82P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of February *4122005 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
